name: Print Label and Tracking Code for GLS
author: Lumen Spei

sections.description:
GLS Delivery is a user-friendly WooCommerce plugin that produces customized GLS labels.

With a single click, you’ll be printing labels while simultaneously initiating the arrival of GLS courier, as well as the Email and SMS services.

This plugin eliminates the need to manually complete GLS forms; simply go to the order details page, select the menu, and click “Print Label”. Labels will be instantly generated and printed, and deliveries can be made.

FEATURES:

  • Single label print
  • Multi (bulk) label print
  • Initiate the arrival of GLS courier
  • Easy connect to GLS API service
  • Tracking code
  • SMS and Email notification
  • One click delivery to customers

Before using our app, you need to request API access from GLS.

REQUIREMENTS:

  • An account and ID of GLS
  • Username and password

AVAILABLE IN:

  • Germany
  • Austria
  • Italy
  • Denmark
  • Hungary
  • Slovakia
  • Czech Republic
  • Romania
  • Slovenia
  • Croatia

A free 3 day trial of the plugin is available to help users decide if they’d like to purchase the full version of the product. For more details, please visit Deliveryfrom.shop and refer to the FAQ section.

Contact

We greatly appreciate you testing out this plugin and would be more than happy to offer assistance.

For purchasing a full plugin license, please visit: Deliveryfrom.shop

Please direct your questions and feedback to info@lumenspei.com, as well as to find out more about our availability in additional countries.
sections.installation:
PREREQUISITE

  1. You need to have an account on the GLS, including a username and password
  2. You need to have a GLS ID

After installing and activating the plugin, you’ll get

  1. New Control Panel tab under WooCommerce > Settings
  2. New configuration options for GLS Print Label
  3. New print action button appears in WooCommerce > Orders

    (If you don’t see the print action button in WooCommerce > Orders then click on Screen Options on top right corner and check the “Actions“)

CONFIGURING PLUGIN SETINGS

  1. Navigate to GLS Settings tab under WooCommerce > Settings
  2. Configure the GLS server and other configuration fields to connect with the GLS API Server

SERVER API PATH

Depending on which GLS Server (country) you are connecting you need to copy/paste path to server API.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin a full or trial version?

Try out the plugins before buying with a 3-day Temporary License. After the trial period has expired, this license will no longer be valid. For unlimited access, please visit Deliveryfrom.shop

How can I test the plugin?

For testing purpose, please use:

  1. License Key: E9409-EFE0A-19BB6-35300-4A4E (it will be valid for 3 days)
  2. Email: your valid email address
  3. Phone: your valid phone number
sections.changelog:
4.12.2

Release date: December 19th, 2023

Updated tracking URLs

4.12.1

Release date: November 4th, 2023

Minor bug fixed when no labels returned

4.10.0

Release date: June 16th, 2023

Added new services for Germany and Austria

Added option to display parcelshops only for select countries

4.0.0

Release date: January 13th, 2023

Enhancements: Switching to a subscription model for our plugin products and granted a counter in WooCommerce dashboard that will act as a reminder to prolong subscription a week prior to its expiry

Austrian GLS has changed the parameters for which some users might have experienced issues. This has been fixed in this version.

The canceling of the already created label is now possible for the cancelation (Works for Germany, Croatia, Hungary, Slovenia, Slovakia, Czech Republic and Romania)

A layout of the already generated label is now able to be arranged at will (Works for Germany, Croatia, Hungary, Slovenia, Slovakia, Czech Republic and Romania)

Parcel Locker’s checkout map has been connected in a way that clicking on each entry in the search bar displays the location on the map (Works for Croatia only at the moment)

3.11.7

Release date: December 14th, 2022

Enhancements: Upgraded German plugin version with the following services included: ShopDeliveryService (also known as ParcelStore)

Earlier versions

For the changelog of earlier versions, please refer to the changelog on our website Deliveryfrom.shop
